description: This file defines the LlamaIndexKnowledgeBase class, which integrates with the llama_index library to perform document retrieval and management within a knowledge base system. It includes methods for searching documents, loading data, and checking existence, utilizing external llama_index components and internal project modules.

classes.name: LlamaIndexKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that provides document retrieval and management functionalities using llama_index, extending the AgentKnowledge base class.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a search query against the retriever, returning a list of Document objects that match the query, with optional filtering by number of documents and additional filters.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads or updates the knowledge base, utilizing an optional loader callable if provided.

methods.name: exists
methods.description: Checks if the knowledge base exists; currently only logs a warning and returns True.
